full_description:
Huntkey HK360 ATX Casing

The Huntkey HK360 ATX Casing is a sturdy and elegant computer case that is compatible with many motherboard sizes and storage configurations. This case's 0.45mm SPCC metal construction provides robust protection for your components without sacrificing style. The HK360 supports ATX, M-ATX, and Mini-ITX motherboards, offering flexibility for a range of system topologies. Users may efficiently save their data because of its huge capacity. One 3.5-inch HDD and two 2.5-inch SSDs can be installed in it. A standard ATX power supply unit (PSU) slot on the shell ensures compatibility with a variety of power sources. With a 155mm maximum height restriction, it also offers plenty of room for CPU cooling and can fit huge graphics cards up to 330mm in length. With its seven PCI-E slots, the HK360 gives you a variety of expansion choices to add more peripherals or components to your system. For easy communication, the I/O connector panel has audio jacks and two USB 1.1 ports. The shell has one 120mm actual fan at the back and one 120mm side fan to ensure ideal airflow and cooling performance. This improves heat dissipation and keeps your system operating smoothly even under heavy use. The metal front panel of the Huntkey HK360 ATX Casing lends an elegant touch that works well in both home and professional settings. This panel gives your components more durability and protection in addition to improving the casing's visual appeal. The HK360 has the functionality, adaptability, and design to suit your demands whether you're constructing a professional workstation or a gaming rig.

full_description:
Huntkey GS450S ATX Gaming Casing

The Huntkey GS450S ATX Gaming Casing combines a powerful feature set with a stylish and practical design to satisfy the demands of both PC enthusiasts and gamers. This shell guarantees compatibility with a broad range of hardware configurations by supporting several motherboard form factors, such as ATX, M-ATX, and Mini-ITX. With two 3.5" and two 2.5" drive bays, users may fit both conventional hard disk drives and solid-state drives because of the substantial space it offers. Furthermore, the enclosure features seven expansion card slots that can be extended, accommodating graphics cards up to 305mm in length, and providing ample room for customization and updates. A comprehensive range of I/O ports, including USB 3.0 x1, USB 2.0 x2, headphone x1, and microphone x1, are conveniently located on the casing to facilitate the easy integration of accessories and devices. This casing's sturdy 0.5mm SPCC metal construction guarantees stability and longevity while maintaining a modern appearance. Users may display their internal components thanks to the clear glass side panel, which enhances the overall aesthetic appeal. The enclosure provides effective cooling options and accommodates several system fans. Users may maintain the best possible thermal performance for their components with the help of four 120mm fans: two on top, one at the back, three at the front, and two within. Compatibility with a broad variety of cooling systems is ensured by the 160mm maximum height of the CPU cooler. The RGB lighting on the shell adds even more visual appeal and gives the design a more dynamic touch. The Huntkey GS450S ATX Gaming Casing combines performance, style, and usefulness to satisfy the needs of contemporary PC users, whether they are gaming or working on demanding computer duties.

full_description:
Huntkey S980 Tornado ATX Casing White

The Huntkey S980 Tornado ATX Casing White is an ample and stylish casing that can accommodate your high-end gaming and computing needs. This casing has a wide and vertical structure to fit various motherboard sizes, such as ATX, M-ATX, and Mini-ITX. It also has a large CPU cooler height limit of 160mm and a VGA length limit of 400mm. The Huntkey casing also has a flexible and efficient cooling system that can keep your system cool and stable. It has multiple fan slots that can support up to 12 120mm fans, which can be installed on the top, rear, bottom, and side of the casing. The Huntkey S980 Tornado also has a liquid cooler installation option that can support a top 360mm or a side 240mm radiator to provide superior cooling performance. The Huntkey S980 Tornado ATX Casing has a front I/O connector that has one USB 3.0 port, two USB 2.0 ports, a headset jack, and a mic jack, which can help you connect your devices and peripherals quickly and easily. It also has a storage capacity that can support one 3.5-inch and two 2.5-inch drives and seven PCI slots to expand your system with additional cards and devices. The Huntkey S980 Tornado ATX Casing White has a sleek and elegant appearance, with a white color and a transparent side panel that can showcase your components and lighting effects.

full_description:
Huntkey GS400C ATX Gaming Casing

The Huntkey GS400C ATX Gaming Casing is a great option for gamers looking for a sturdy housing solution since it blends stylish design with useful functions. This enclosure, which allows customers to display their hardware configurations, is made of 0.5mm SPCC material and has a clear acrylic side panel and a textured finishing steel outside. It gives off a modern, dynamic appeal. It can hold up to two 3.5-inch HDDs and two 2.5-inch SSDs for adequate storage space, and it supports ATX, Micro ATX, and Mini ITX motherboards, offering adaptability for a range of build sizes. Supporting ATX power supplies, CPU coolers up to 160mm high, and graphics cards up to 320mm long, it guarantees compatibility with both high-performance components and conventional power setups. This shell provides versatility and ease for creating bespoke gaming rigs with its seven expansion slots, I/O panel with one USB 3.0 port, two USB 2.0 ports, audio jacks, and provisions for numerous cooling fans (fans not supplied). With features and functionality that gamers want to create immersive gaming experiences, the Huntkey GS400C Casing optimizes airflow and showcases hardware beauty.
